results.name: Largest m<=n such that no carry occurs when adding m to n in ternary arithmetic.
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: a167877 n = head [x | let ts = a030341_row n, x <- [n, n-1 ..],
xref: Cf. A007089, A167831, A035327 for the decimal and binary cases.
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 14 2009
